name: pink-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Cuteness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Cuteness while in a contest.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that raises CUTE in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises CUTE in CONTESTS.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. It boosts the holding POKéMON’s CUTE condition in CONTESTS.
